content: tyrannosaurus rex hat this dinosaur themed hat is worked in the round on 40 circular needles using the magic loop method it is designed to fit an older child or adult sized head the size could be adjusted to fit a smaller head with a lighter weight yarn and smaller needle sizes materials gauge - aran/bulky weight yarn in 2 colors -16 sts x 13 row 4 inches on size - color a- white 8 needles - color b- green ** this gauge does not have to be - size us 7 interchangeable needles for exact this hat will have plenty of ribbing stretch as long as you do not pull - size us 8 interchangeable needles the stranded color work too tight ** - 40 circular cable instructions cast on color b using size 7 needles and 40 inch cable loosely cast on 72 stitches being careful not to twist yarn use magic loop method place bor marker and join for first row row 1-10 k2 p2 until end of row switch to size 8 needles row 11-12 join color a k until end of row row 13- 32 work chart as shown chart row 1-20 row 33 break color b working in color a k to end of row placing markers every 8 stitches decrease row *knit to 2 stitches before marker k2tog *repeat to end of row row 35 k all stitches repeat row 34 and 35 six times you should now have 18 stitches remaining row 45 k2tog to end of row row 46 k2tog to end of row bind off secure yarn through remaining stitches passing it through multiple times to ensure they are secure weave in ends optional using a pompom maker create a pompom from color b and secure with yarn or thread to the bind off enjoy -if using this pattern to sell the finished product please credit the pattern to myself the designer -
